InformativeText.Abstract: The Correlated Color Temperature characteristic is used to represent correlated color temperature in a range from 800 to 65534 Kelvin with a resolution of 1 Kelvin.

Field.name: Correlated Color Temperature
Field.InformativeText: Unit is Kelvin with a resolution of 1.
Field.Description: A value of 0xFFFF represents 'value is not known'.
